name: NikaMitziConversation
_source: s;Mitzi;No need to be abrupt. I just wished to ask you about Frees.
s;Nika;Why? There's barely anything there but wheat.
s;Mitzi;Perhaps, but I was hoping to write a brief history of the region,|and wanted to know the origin of your village.

s;Nika;Oh.{w} That story's normally passed down by village elders.|After the fall of the last dynasty, refugees wandered through a pattern-like field,|until they found what felt like the right spot.|A lot of villagers think Atropos guided our ancestors there.
s;Mitzi;Mmm....{w} No, that's not quite right.
s;Mitzi;I read in Pelopos that the village's elders are a branch of House Charin.
s;Nika;No one I know ever claimed that. You said this was in Pelopos?
s;Nika;Then does Tartarus even know that? Did they even bother visiting Frees?
s;Mitzi;I don't see how that's relevant.
s;Mitzi;Doesn't even know her own village's history. How sad.
